name: Ex rel John SINGLETON v. Sylvester JOHNSON, Police Commissioner, Philadelphia Police Department, Petition of John Singleton

parties: Ex rel John SINGLETON v. Sylvester JOHNSON, Police Commissioner, Philadelphia Police Department, Petition of John Singleton.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of DECEMBER, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether the Commonwealth can prevail in a common law forfeiture matter where it did not offer evidence that the items Petitioner sought to have returned were linked to the crimes to which he pled guilty?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
938 A.2d 982
Ex rel John SINGLETON v. Sylvester JOHNSON, Police Commissioner, Philadelphia Police Department, Petition of John Singleton.
No. 396 EAL 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 12, 2007.
